EmailTemplate.name: 18-BG TO-NAB event invitation-Email-NAB event email-T001ZC.NAB Invite Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at NAB Show
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> NAB Show Las Vegas, 9 – 12 April 2018 What decision would you make today if you could see the future? At NAB Show, Nokia will show its vision for the future of television, a future we’re calling Any Vision.
Any Vision is a window to our forthcoming reality, ushering in major changes in user consumption. If you want to get a glimpse of what the future of TV will look like, Nokia has built a unique demonstration for you. Join us in the upper floor of the South Hall (SU 5515) and book a demo <[[mailto:jo.mepham@nokia.com?subject=Any Vision - please book a demo]]> now to experience Any Vision. Our experts and business leaders will be available to discuss the implications of Any Vision for your business. Explore how Nokia can help you reap the benefits of Any Vision, leveraging Nokia’s market-leading capabilities in content personalization and distribution, Cloud DVR and a global team of video systems integration experts.
More about Any Vision <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/ip-video/anyvision]]>
View the event page <[[https://www.nabshow.com/]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
